prjText: The Password Generator allows a user to define input options to generate a random password string. The input values must contain between 8 and 24 characters and be made up of at least all lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, special characters, or a combination of any of these four inputs.

Tech Blog prompts first time visitors to signup and allows a registered user to create and delete blog posts and add comments if they are signed in. This multiple page application uses Handlebars.js as it's templating engine to render which view to present to the user.
